text: @PayZenThe High Cost of Health: Analyzing America’s Healthcare Affordability Crisis report is a sobering reminder of the challenges Americans face in affording healthcare. 💰🏥 Did you know that on average, people can only afford a max monthly payment of $97 for out-of-pocket medical costs? 😱 This means many are skipping or delaying necessary care, including preventive visits (49%), prescription drugs (48%), mental health care (40%), and diagnostic testing (39%). 💔At PayZen, we're committed to using AI-powered solutions to tackle healthcare affordability issues head-on.
